About Shuga

Shuga was founded by Thomas Ong and Jeffrey Chang, both of whom come with a wealth of knowledge in the retail, e-commerce, data analytics and software engineering industry combined. 

The app was made available to Singapore market in Feburary 2018. 

Shuga prides itself as an AI data company offering prescriptive analytics tailored to all types of retail. 

Today, Shuga has close to 500 participating stores and amassed transactional volume of more than $800M.
